title: Dynamic Queue
body: Can we have the dynamic queue back? or tell us why its being worked on?{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey RobotPanda,

Riot NaKyle made a post a few of hours ago talking about Dynamic queue. You can check it out [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/28aUeeGd-dynamic-ranked-new-champ-select-whatos-wrong-and-whatos-next)!

i have three more questions. 
1. can teambuilder come back until it's fixed ?
2. when is hextech crafting coming to NA?
